statements: SELECT * FROM community_policing_initiatives;
SELECT initiative_name, location, start_date FROM community_policing_initiatives WHERE officer_id = 1;
SELECT id, initiative_name, outcome FROM community_policing_initiatives WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT location, start_date, end_date FROM community_policing_initiatives ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM community_policing_initiatives WHERE location IN ('Park', 'School') AND outcome IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM community_policing_initiatives WHERE initiative_name = 'Neighborhood Watch' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT id, officer_id, initiative_name, outcome FROM community_policing_initiatives WHERE location IS NOT NULL AND start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY end_date;

SELECT initiative_name, officer_id, start_date, end_date, outcome FROM community_policing_initiatives WHERE initiative_name LIKE '%Youth%' OR initiative_name LIKE '%Community%' ORDER BY officer_id, start_date DESC;
SELECT id, initiative_name, location FROM community_policing_initiatives WHERE officer_id = 123 ORDER BY location, start_date;
SELECT * FROM community_policing_initiatives WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01' AND end_date <= '2021-12-31' OR location = 'Park' ORDER BY initiative_name ASC, end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CommunityPolicingInitiatives;
SELECT initiative_name, effectiveness_score FROM CommunityPolicingInitiatives ORDER BY effectiveness_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM PoliceOfficers WHERE department = 'Traffic';
SELECT officer_name, rank FROM PoliceOfficers WHERE years_of_service > 5;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM CommunityPolicingInitiatives WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CommunityPolicingInitiatives WHERE effectiveness_score > 80
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM CommunityPolicingInitiatives ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT * FROM PoliceOfficers WHERE department = 'Patrol'
SELECT officer_name, rank FROM PoliceOfficers WHERE years_of_service >= 10 ORDER BY rank
SELECT SUM(effectiveness_score) AS total_score FROM CommunityPolicingInitiatives
SELECT * FROM community_policing_initiatives;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM community_policing_initiatives;
SELECT * FROM policing_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT officer_name, description FROM policing_reports WHERE initiative_id = 1;
SELECT evaluation_date, effectiveness_rating, comments FROM initiative_evaluation WHERE initiative_id = 2 ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM community_policing_initiatives;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM community_policing_initiatives ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT location, start_date FROM community_policing_initiatives WHERE location='City Center';
SELECT * FROM policing_reports WHERE officer_name='John Doe' ORDER BY report_date ASC;

SELECT initiative_name, effectiveness_rating FROM community_policing_initiatives INNER JOIN initiative_evaluation ON community_policing_initiatives.id = initiative_evaluation.initiative_id WHERE effectiveness_rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM community_policing_projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM community_policing_projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT officer_name, rank FROM police_officers WHERE department_id = 1 ORDER BY officer_name ASC;
SELECT member_name, phone_number FROM community_members WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT project_id, officer_id, date, rating FROM evaluations WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC, date ASC;
SELECT * FROM community_members WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY member_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM community_policing_projects WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT officer_name, department_id, rank FROM police_officers WHERE department_id = 3 OR rank = 'Sergeant' ORDER BY officer_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, description FROM community_policing_projects WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT member_name, address, email FROM community_members WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%' ORDER BY address ASC;
SELECT * FROM community_centers;
SELECT center_name, location FROM community_centers WHERE center_id = 1;
SELECT officer_name, rank FROM police_officers WHERE rank = 'Sergeant';
SELECT * FROM community_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT incident_type, location FROM incidents WHERE incident_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM community_centers;
SELECT center_id, center_name, director_name FROM community_centers ORDER BY center_name DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date, location FROM community_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, location FROM incidents WHERE incident_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY incident_id DESC;
SELECT officer_id, officer_name, badge_number, rank FROM police_officers WHERE rank = 'Sergeant' AND center_id = 3 ORDER BY officer_name ASC;
